oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Oklahoma Roundup Rehearsal - 1946-08-16 - KOMA - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Rehearsal from the Oklahoma Roundup radio program on August 17, 1946 on radio station KOMA (Oklahoma City, Okla). Staff includes Hiram Higsby (master of ceremonies, writer), Allan Page (announcer, director), and Kenyon Brown (producer). Guest appearance by Oklahoma Governor, Robert S. Kerr.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Homegrown Trio; Ann Bond; Hiram Higsby; Robert S. Kerr; Dick Reinhart; Mary Lou; Chuck Davis
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) [Blank] (0:37) Hiram Higsby tells a joke / (0:55) The Homegrown Trio performs "Cool Water" / (3:03) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (3:34) Ann Bond performs a medley of "Get Along Home Cindy" and "Take Me Home" / (5:23) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke with a guest appearance by Robert S. Kerr / (8:10) Robert S. Kerr and Hiram Higsby perform "Home On The Range" / (9:47) Dick Reinhart and Mary Lou perform "This World Is Not My Home" / (11:30) Chuck Davis performs a square dance / (13:07) Closing theme and statements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Oklahoma Roundup; KOMA (Radio station : Oklahoma City, Okla.); CBS Inc.; Kerr, Robert S. (Robert Samuel), 1896-1963; Bond, Ann; Higsby, Hiram, 1909-1975; Reinhart, Dick; Davis, Chuck;
